price: No muri bo (Abayahudi) hari abatarize batazi gusoma no kwandika, ntibanamenye igitabo (Tawurati), uretse ukwizera kujyanye n’ibyifuzo bidafite ishingiro; ahubwo barangwa no gukeka gusa.
arabic: وَمِنۡهُمۡ أُمِّيُّونَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّآ أَمَانِيَّ وَإِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَظُنُّونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum ummiyyūna lā yaʿlamūna al-kitāba illā amāniyya wa-in hum illā yaẓunnūna
